position.description: Computer-generated, five-character number equal to the length of the entire record, including itself and the record terminator. The number is right justified and unused positions contain zeros.
position.name: Record length

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the relationship of the record to a file for file maintenance purposes.
position.name: Record status

value.description: Increase in encoding level from prepublication

position.description: One-character alphabetic code used to define the characteristics and components of the record.
position.name: Type of record

value.description: Three-dimensional artifact or naturally occurring object

position.description: One-character alphabetic code indicating the bibliographic level of the record.
position.name: Bibliographic level

position.description: Identifies the character coding scheme used in the record.
position.name: Character coding scheme

position.description: Computer-generated number 2 that indicates the number of character positions used for indicators in a variable data field.
position.name: Indicator count

value.description: Number of character positions used for indicators

position.description: Computer-generated number 2 that indicates the number of character positions used for each subfield code in a variable data field.
position.name: Subfield code count

value.description: Number of character positions used for a subfield code

position.description: Computer-generated, five-character numeric string that indicates the first character position of the first variable control field in a record. The number is right justified and each unused position contains a zero.
position.name: Base address of data

position.description: One-character alphanumeric code that indicates the fullness of the bibliographic information and/or content designation of the MARC record.
position.name: Encoding level

position.description: One-character alphanumeric code that indicates characteristics of the descriptive data in the record through reference to cataloging norms. Subfield $e (Description conventions) of field 040 (Cataloging Source) may contain additional information on the cataloging conventions used.
position.name: Descriptive cataloging form

position.description: Always contains a 4.
position.name: Length of the length-of-field portion

value.description: Number of characters in the length-of-field portion of a Directory entry

position.description: Always contains a 5.
position.name: Length of the starting-character-position portion

value.description: Number of characters in the starting-character-position portion of a Directory

position.description: Always contains a 0.
position.name: Length of the implementation-defined portion

value.description: Number of characters in the implementation-defined portion of a Directory entry

position.description: Always contains a 0.
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Special class of cartographic material to which the item belongs.
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Whether the item is in one color or multicolored.
position.name: Color

position.description: Material out of which the cartographic item is made.
position.name: Physical medium

position.description: Whether the cartographic item is a facsimile or other type of reproduction.
position.name: Type of reproduction

position.description: Photographic technique used to produce the cartographic item.
position.name: Production/reproduction details

position.description: Positive/negative aspect of the photocopy or film of the cartographic item.
position.name: Positive/negative aspect

position.description: Special class of material (usually the class of physical object) to which an item belongs (e.g., a magnetic disk).
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Whether the item is one color or multicolored.
position.name: Color

position.description: Dimensions of the medium used to encode the electronic resource.
position.name: Dimensions

position.description: Whether the production of sound is an integral part of an electronic resource.
position.name: Sound

position.description: Exact bit depth of the scanned image(s) that comprise the electronic resource, or a three-character alphabetic code which indicates that the exact bit depth cannot be recorded. Since only exact bit depth is useful, coding should not include missing digits represented by hyphens (-).
position.name: Image bit depth

position.description: Whether the file(s) which comprise the electronic resource are of the same format or type for digitally reformatted materials.
position.name: File formats

position.description: Whether quality assurance targets have been included appropriately at the time of reformatting/creation of the electronic resource.
position.name: Quality assurance target(s)

position.description: Information about the source of a digital file important to the creation, use and management of digitally reformatted materials.
position.name: Antecedent/Source

value.description: File reproduced from an electronic resource
File reproduced from an intermediate (not microform)

position.description: Kind of compression the electronic resource has been subjected to.
position.name: Level of compression

position.description: Reformatting quality of the electronic resource; an overall assessment of the physical quality of the electronic resource in relation to its intended use. It can be used to judge the level of quality of a file, and an institution's commitment to maintain its availability over time.
position.name: Reformatting Quality

position.description: Special class of material (usually the class of physical object) to which an item belongs, e.g., a celestial globe.
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Whether the globe is in one color or multicolored.
position.name: Color

position.description: Material out of which the globe is made.
position.name: Physical medium

position.description: Whether the globe is a facsimile or other type of reproduction.
position.name: Type of reproduction

position.description: Special class of tactile materialspecific material to which the item belongs.
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Family of braille to which the item belongs. This is not the particular braille code, but the type of braille code used, representing different types of written symbols. Up to two braille types may be indicated, or the cataloging agency can choose to encode only the predominate type. Multiple codes are coded in order of predominance, if any. If fewer than two codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and unused positions contain blanks (#).
position.name: Class of braille writing

value.description: No specified class of braille writing

position.description: Whether contractions are used.
position.name: Level of contraction

position.description: Three-character code that indicates the braille music format of the item. The music formats are the way measures, sections, parts, and related information, such as words, are presented in relation to each other. Up to three formats may be indicated, left justified in order of predominance. If fewer than three codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and unused positions contain blanks (#).
position.name: Braille music format

position.description: Other special physical characteristics about the braille.
position.name: Special physical characteristics

position.description: Special class of projected graphic to which the item belongs, e.g., a slide.
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Color characteristics of a projected graphic.
position.name: Color

position.description: Type of material for the base of the emulsion of a photonegative, filmstrip, slide, or transparency.
position.name: Base of emulsion

value.description: Film base, other than safety film

position.description: Whether the sound is on or is separate from the projected graphic (i.e., on the accompanying material).
position.name: Sound on medium or separate

position.description: Specific medium used to carry the sound of an item (whether the sound is on the projected graphic or separate) and the type of sound playback required for the item.
position.name: Medium for sound

value.description: Optical sound track on motion picture film
Magnetic sound track on motion picture film
Optical and magnetic sound track on motion picture film

position.description: Width or dimensions of the projected graphic item.
position.name: Dimensions

position.description: Type of material of the mount of a slide or transparency for a projected graphic.
position.name: Secondary support material

position.description: Special class of microform to which the item belongs. (e.g., a microopaque).
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Positive/negative polarity of the microform.
position.name: Positive/negative aspect

position.description: Reduction ratio range for a microform. The specific reduction ratio is recorded in 007/06-08 (Reduction ratio).
position.name: Reduction ratio range

position.description: Number specifying the reduction ratio for a microform, recorded as three digits. The number is right justified and each unused position contains a zero (e.g., 015, 048). A hyphen is used for any unknown portion of the reduction ratio (e.g., 03-, 1--, or ---).
position.name: Reduction ratio

position.description: Color of the image for microforms.
position.name: Color

position.description: Type of light-sensitive material on the film.
position.name: Emulsion on film

position.description: Generation aspect of a microform.
position.name: Generation

position.description: Base of the film.
position.name: Base of film

position.description: Special class of nonprojected graphic to which the item belongs, (e.g., a picture).
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Color characteristics of the nonprojected graphic.
position.name: Color

position.description: Type of material used for the support or base on which an image is printed or executed.
position.name: Primary support material

position.description: Type of material (other than normal museum matting) to which the secondary support (007/04) is attached.
position.name: Secondary support material

position.description: Special class of motion picture to which the item belongs., e.g., a film reel.
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Color characteristics of a motion picture.
position.name: Color

position.description: Presentation format for motion pictures.
position.name: Motion picture presentation format

position.description: Whether the sound is on the item or separate from the item.
position.name: Sound on medium or separate

position.description: Specific medium used to carry the sound of an item (whether that sound is carried on the item itself or is in the form of accompanying material) and the type of sound playback required.
position.name: Medium for sound

value.description: Optical sound track on motion picture film
Magnetic sound track on motion picture film
Optical and magnetic sound track on motion picture film

position.description: Width of a motion picture.
position.name: Dimensions

position.description: Configuration of playback channels for the sound portion of a motion picture.
position.name: Configuration of playback channels

position.description: Whether the film is part of a complete production or is a preliminary or post-production element.
position.name: Production elements

position.description: Whether the film is positive or negative.
position.name: Positive/negative aspect

position.description: How far away from the original material the item is (e.g., the actual negative film or original videotape in the camera). Generation data is used to evaluate the quality of available copies, to make preservation decisions, and to identify materials available for viewing and research.
position.name: Generation

position.description: More specific color characteristics of the moving image than are contained in 007/03 (Color).
position.name: Refined categories of color

position.description: Type of color film stock or color print the item represents.
position.name: Kind of color stock or print

position.description: Level of deterioration of the motion picture film.
position.name: Deterioration stage

position.description: Whether or not the item being cataloged is judged to be complete.
position.name: Completeness

position.description: Special class of textual material to which an item belongs.
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Special class of textual material to which an item belongs.
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Special class of material, usually the class of physical object, to which an item belongs..
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: General position of the sensor relative to to the object under study.
position.name: Altitude of sensor

position.description: General angle of the device from which the remote-sensing image is made.
position.name: Attitude of sensor

position.description: Amount of cloud cover that was present when a remote-sensing image was made.
position.name: Cloud cover

position.description: Type of construction of the platform serving as the base for the remote-sensing device. For the purposes of this data element, "platform" refers to any structure that serves as a base, not only flat surfaces.
position.name: Platform construction type

position.description: Primary use intended for the platform specified in 007/06 (Platform construction type).
position.name: Platform use category

position.description: For the recording mode of the remote-sensing device, specifically, whether the sensor is involved in the creation of the transmission it eventually measures.
position.name: Sensor type

position.description: Spectral, acoustic, or magnetic characteristics of the data received by the device producing the remote-sensing image. It can be used to indicate both the wave length of radiation measured and the type of sensor used to measure it.
position.name: Data type

position.description: Special class of sound recording to which the item belongs (e.g., a cylinder).
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Playback speed of the sound recording.
position.name: Speed

position.description: Configuration of playback channels for a sound recording.
position.name: Configuration of playback channels

position.description: Width of the groove of the recording for discs or the pitch of the groove for cylinders.
position.name: Groove width/groove pitch

position.description: Diameter of an open reel or disc, or the dimensions of a cassette, cartridge, or cylinder.
position.name: Dimensions

position.description: Width of the tape.
position.name: Tape width

position.description: Number of tracks on a tape.
position.name: Tape Configuration
Kind of disc, cylinder or tape

position.description: Kind of material used in the manufacture of sound recordings (both instantaneous and mass-produced).
position.name: Kind of material

value.description: Paper with lacquer or ferrous oxide

position.description: Kind of cutting of the grooves used on a disc.
position.name: Kind of cutting

position.description: How the sound was originally captured and stored. Re-releases of recordings should be coded for the original capture and storage technique, even though such re-releases may have been enhanced using another technique.
position.name: Capture and storage technique

position.description: Special class of textual material to which an item belongs.
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Special class of videorecording to which an item belongs.
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: Contains blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined

position.description: Color characteristics of a videorecording.
position.name: Color

position.description: Videotape or videodisc recording format.
position.name: Videorecording format

position.description: Whether the sound is on the item or separate from the item (i.e., on the accompanying material).
position.name: Sound on medium or separate

position.description: Specific medium used to carry the sound of an item, whether that sound is carried on the videorecording or is separate, and the type of sound playback required for the item.
position.name: Medium for sound

value.description: Optical sound track on motion picture film
Magnetic sound track on motion picture film
Optical and magnetic sound track on motion picture film

position.description: Width of the videorecording.
position.name: Dimensions

position.description: Configuration of intended playback channels for the sound portion of a videorecording.
position.name: Configuration of playback channels

position.description: Special class of material to which the item belongs.
position.name: Specific material designation

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates that categorizes the type of dates given in 008/07-10 (Date 1) and 008/11-14 (Date 2). For continuing resources, the code in 008/06 also indicates the publication status.
position.name: Type of date/Publication status

value.description: No dates given; B.C. date involved
Range of years of bulk of collection
Date of distribution/release/issue and production/recording session when

position.description: A date specified by the code in 008/06 (Type of date/Publication status).
position.name: Date 1

value.description: Date element is totally or partially unknown

position.description: A date specified by the code in 008/06 (Type of date/Publication status).
position.name: Date 2

value.description: Date element is totally or partially unknown

position.name: Place of publication, production, or execution

position.description: One-character code that indicates whether any data in a bibliographic record is a modification of information that appeared on the item being cataloged or that was intended to be included in the MARC record.
position.name: Modified record

position.description: One-character code that indicates the original cataloging source of the record. If the cataloging source is known, it is identified in subfield $a of field 040 (Cataloging Source).
position.name: Cataloging source

position.description: Up to four (4) one-character alphabetic codes (recorded in alphabetical order)that indicate the presence of types of illustrations in the item. If fewer than four alphabetic codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and unused positions contain blanks (#).
position.name: Illustrations (006/01-04)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that describes the intellectual level of the target audience for which the material is intended.
position.name: Target audience (006/05)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that specifies the form of material for the item.
position.name: Form of item (006/06)

position.description: Up to four one-character codes (recorded in alphabetical order) that indicate whether a significant part of the item is or contains certain types of material. If fewer than four codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and unused positions contain blanks (#).
position.name: Nature of contents (006/07-10)

value.description: Surveys of literature in a subject area

position.description: One-character code that indicates whether or not the item is published or produced by or for an international, national, state, provincial, or local government agency, or by any subdivision of such a body.
position.name: Government publication (006/11)

value.description: Unknown if item is government publication

position.description: One-character code that indicates whether the item consists of the proceedings, reports, or summaries of a conference.
position.name: Conference publication (006/12)

position.description: One-character code that indicates whether the item is a festschrift.
position.name: Festschrift (006/13)

position.description: One-character numeric code that indicates whether the item includes an index to its own contents.
position.name: Index (006/14)

position.description: Contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/15)

position.description: One-character code used to indicate the literary form of an item. Numeric codes 0 and 1 provide a generic identification of whether or not the item is a work of fiction. Alphabetic codes may be used to identify specific literary forms.
position.name: Literary form (006/16)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates whether or not an item contains biographical material, and if so, what the biographical characteristics are.
position.name: Biography (006/17)

position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/01-04)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code describes indicates the target audience for which the material is intended.
position.name: Target audience (006/05)

position.description: Three undefined character positions; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/06-08)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the type of computer file described in the bibliographic record.
position.name: Type of computer file (006/09)

position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/10)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates whether the computer file is published or produced by or for an international, national, provincial, state, or local government agency (including intergovermental bodies of all types), any subdivision of such a body and, if so, the jurisdictional level of the agency.
position.name: Government publication (006/11)

value.description: Unknown if item is government publication

position.description: Six undefined character positions; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/12-17)

position.description: Up to four one-character alphabetic codes that indicate the relief type specified on the item. Codes are recorded in order of their importance to the described item. If fewer than four codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and each unused position contains a blank (#).
position.name: Relief (006/01-04)

position.description: Two-character alphabetic code that indicates the projection used in producing the item.
position.name: Projection (006/05-06)

position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/07)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the type of cartographic item described.
position.name: Type of cartographic material (006/08)

value.description: Bound as part of another work

position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/09-10)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates whether the item is published or produced by or for an international, national, provincial, state, or local government agency, or by any subdivision of such a body, and, if so, the jurisdictional level of the agency.
position.name: Government publication (006/11)

value.description: Unknown if item is government publication

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the form of material for the item.
position.name: Form of item (006/12)

position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/13)

position.description: One-character numeric code that indicates whether the item or accompanying material includes a location index or gazetteer.
position.name: Index (006/14)

position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/15)

position.description: Up to two one-character alphabetic codes that indicate the special format characteristics of the map. Codes are recorded in order of their importance to the described item. If only one code is assigned, it is left justified and the unused position contains a blank (#).
position.name: Special format characteristics (006/16-17)

value.description: Divertimentos, serenades, cassations, divertissements, and notturni

position.description: One-character code that indicates the format of a musical composition (e.g., piano-conductor score).
position.name: Format of music (006/03)

value.description: Full score, miniature or study size

position.description: One character code that indicates whether the item being cataloged contains parts. This position is not used to indicate that parts may exist elsewhere.
position.name: Music parts (006/04)

value.description: No parts in hand or not specified

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that describes the intellectual level of the target audience for which the material is intended
position.name: Target audience (006/05)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that specifies the form of material for the item being described.
position.name: Form of item (006/06)

position.description: Up to six one-character alphabetic codes (recorded in alphabetical order) that indicate the contents of program notes and other accompanying material for sound recording, music manuscripts, or notated music. If fewer than six codes are assigned, the codes are left justified and each unused position contains a blank (#).
position.name: Accompanying matter (006/07-12)

value.description: Biography of performer or history of ensemble
Technical and/or historical information on instruments

position.description: Up to two one-character codes (recorded in the order of the following list) that indicate the type of literary text contained in a nonmusical sound recording. If only one code is assigned, it is left justified and the unused position contains a blank (#).
position.name: Literary text for sound recordings (006/13-14)

value.description: Item is a music sound recording

position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/15)

position.description: Whether all or part of the item being cataloged is a transposition and/or arrangement of another work.
position.name: Transposition and arrangement (006/16)

value.description: Not arrangement or transposition or not specified

position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/17)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the frequency of an item; used in conjunction with 008/19 (Regularity).
position.name: Frequency (006/01)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the intended regularity of an item; used in conjunction with 008/18 (Frequency).
position.name: Regularity (006/02)

position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/03)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the type of continuing resource.
position.name: Type of continuing resource (006/04)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the form of material in which an item was originally published.
position.name: Form of original item (006/05)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that specifies the form of material for the item being described.
position.name: Form of item (006/06)

value.description: Surveys of literature in a subject area
Surveys of literature in a subject area

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates whether an item is published or produced by or for an international, national, provincial, state, or local government agency, or by any subdivision of such a body, and, if so, the jurisdictional level of the agency.
position.name: Government publication (006/11)

value.description: Unknown if item is government publication

position.description: One-character numeric code that indicates whether an item consists of the proceedings, reports, or summaries of a conference.
position.name: Conference publication (006/12)

position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/13-15)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the original alphabet or script of the language of the title on the source item upon which the key title (field 222) is based.
position.name: Original alphabet or script of title (006/16)

value.description: No alphabet or script given/No key title

position.description: One-character numeric code that indicates whether the item was cataloged according to successive entry, latest entry, or integrated entry cataloging conventions.
position.name: Entry convention (006/17)

position.description: Three-digit number that indicates the total running time of the motion picture or videorecording. The number is right justified and each unused position contains a zero.
position.name: Running time for motion pictures and videorecordings (006/01-03)

position.description: Undefined; contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/04)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the audience for which the item is intended.
position.name: Target audience (006/05)

position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/06-10)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates whether the item is published or produced by or for an international, provincial, national, state, or local government agency, or by any subdivision of such a body, and, if so, the jurisdictional level of the agency.
position.name: Government publication (006/11)

value.description: Unknown if item is government publication

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that specifies the form of material.
position.name: Form of item (006/12)

position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/13-15)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the type of visual material being described.
position.name: Type of visual material (006/16)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that indicates the technique used in creating motion in motion pictures or videorecordings.
position.name: Technique (006/17)

position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/01-05)

position.description: One-character alphabetic code that specifies the form of material for the item.
position.name: Form of item (006/06)

position.description: Undefined; each contains a blank (#) or a fill character (|).
position.name: Undefined (006/07-17)
